page.title: 13MR.MALLESON, ESTATE MANAGER.
page.content: {Mr. Malleson}is the estate manager of the{Ernest Cook Trust}estate in Fairford. The trust is an educational one run on the profits of the agricultural estate. Mr. Malleson's job involves organising the workers on the estate and consequently his normal day is packed with meetings and visits. The estate takes up a large part of the 4km x 3km rectangle that is our area of study. Apart from his job Mr. Malleson is involved in the local community and he is a churchwarden at the parish church. Although his job is such that he does not have a great deal of spare time, when he can snatch a few hours he is a keen gardener.
